attributes.action: ensure that England is provided with an English Assembly as soon as possible, similar to that afforded to other British nations (e.g. Scotland, Wales, etc.), thereby providing English people with an outlet for their collective 'political voice' separate and distinct from that of Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present there are national assemblies elsewhere in the UK and not as yet in England, where there are only 'regional' assemblies. England deserves a level political playing field and should immediately be provided with an English Assembly, so as to ensure fairness to the English people and provide them with a credible national 'political voice' separate and distinct from that of Parliament. England deserves and must be given an English Assembly and in so doing be properly afforded the same political privileges as that given to the other British nations.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
